function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Urban park use declined during the COVID-19 pandemic, leading to more homogenous use by specific demographics.","Impact":"Unequal access to urban parks can lead to negative health impacts in communities.","Mitigation":"Implement equitable strategies to ensure diverse communities have access to urban parks.","Technologies":"Geospatial tracking, data analysis to identify usage patterns and inform planning.","People":"Diverse communities, low-income residents, non-white residents.","Owner":"City planners, public health organizations, community leaders."},{"Description":"Concerns about inequitable distribution of negative impacts of reduced urban park use during the pandemic.","Impact":"Unequal distribution of negative health impacts across diverse communities.","Mitigation":"Conducting research on urban park use and associated benefits, implementing inclusive planning and investment in public park spaces.","Technologies":"Data collection, geospatial analysis, community engagement platforms.","People":"Diverse communities, public health organizations, urban planners.","Owner":"Research institutions, local government, community organizations."}]}
